mapper.insert: insert into total_assess (id, police_id, mental_percent_list, result, description, create_time, update_time) value (#{id}, #{policeId}, #{mentalPercentList}, #{result}, #{description}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: select * from total_assess where police_id = #{policeId} order by create_time desc limit 1

select * from total_assess where police_id in (select id from police where prison_id = #{prisonId}) and ( description like concat('%',#{query}, '%') or police_id in (select p.id from police p,account a where p.account_id = a.id and (p.name like concat('%', #{query}, '%') or a.account_number like concat('%', #{query}, '%') ) ) )

select ta.id, po.name, ta.mental_percent_list as mentalPercentList, ta.result, ta.description, ta.create_time as createTime, ta.update_time as updateTime from total_assess as ta, police as po where po.id = ta.police_id and po.prison_id = #{prisonId}
